name: Google Un-Arial  0.2
description:
Remove ugly "Arial" from Google pages (http/https), resetting to browser "Sans-serif" font.

I like "Cambria/Candara/Consolas" font triple.

todo:
 
 - adjust widget fonts 
 - style must be extended to support gadgets

Changes:

  0.2: reset to main www.google.com (http/https) url match

 0.1.1 -  added support to Calendar gadget iframe
